issue.title: [CI][GLib] Tests are unstable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16293](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16293). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. macOS test is timed out because ccache cache isn't available: https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/6134456502?check_suite_focus=true
2. `gparquet_row_group_metadata_equal()` isn't stable on Windows: https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/6134457213?check_suite_focus=true#step:14:308

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16293?focusedCommentId=17526733) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*

<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12964>
